rx.operators

Interface OperatorReplay.VirtualList<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the value type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OperatorReplay.VirtualArrayList, OperatorReplay.VirtualBoundedList
    Enclosing class:
    OperatorReplay

    public static interface OperatorReplay.VirtualList<T>
    Base interface for logically indexing a list.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(T value)
      Add an element to the list.
      void clear()
      Clear the elements of this list and increase the start by the number of elements.
      int end()
      Returns the current tail index of this list (where the next value would appear).
      T get(int index)
      Retrieve an element at the specified logical index.
      void removeBefore(int index)
      Remove elements up before the given logical index and move the start() to this index.
      void reset()
      Clears and resets the indexes of the list.
      int size() 
      int start()
      Returns the current head index of this list.
      java.util.List<T> toList()
      Returns the current content as a list.

        Returns:

      • removeBefore

        void removeBefore(int index)
        Remove elements up before the given logical index and move the start() to this index.

        For example, a list contains 3 items. Calling removeUntil 2 will remove the first two items.

        Parameters:
        index -

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clear the elements of this list and increase the start by the number of elements.

      • start

        int start()
        Returns the current head index of this list.
        Returns:
        the head index

      • end

        int end()
        Returns the current tail index of this list (where the next value would appear).
        Returns:
        the tail index

      • reset

        void reset()
        Clears and resets the indexes of the list.

      • toList

        java.util.List<T> toList()
        Returns the current content as a list.
        Returns:
        the List representation of this virtual list
